channel.description: Add a sign-in with Okta Verify Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Configure Direct Authentication grant types: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/configure-direct-auth-grants/dmfaoobov/main/ Page type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.
